result.execSummary:
The defendant Randy Lee Plaster was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: Penalties for Felonies-Class "I" Felony], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Concurrent to any other existing sentence.
Concurrent with: to any other existing sentence

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randy Lee Plaster

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: c: Def, Atty, DA, NRPD & Jail. eif
signed by Def & Atty this date. eif
filed by ADA Edward Minser. eif

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot, ADA:   Edward Minser   DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton   DF:  Randy Lee Plaster appeared from jail. Case called at 11:15 am. There is an agreement. The state files amended information with the court. ADA Minser recites agreement. No objection from Atty Caton. Court reviews constitutional rights with Def. Court finds Def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. Court reads charge and possible penalties for amennded Count One without any enhancer, Def pleads Guilty. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates Def guilty of count 1 without any enhancer. Parties make sentecing arguements. Court orders:
- 6 months Jail. Concurrent to any other existing sentence - 57 Days credit
- Court suspends court costs
filed by ADA M. Nieskes. gme

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot,ADA:   Michael E. Nieskes   DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton   DF:  Randy Lee Plaster appeared from jail. Case called at 10:43 am   Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives preliminary hearing. Crt finds probable cause and binds DE over for trial. Court informs Def if charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Atty Caton enters NG Plea. Defendant is still on PO Hold. Bond remains as is. Reserve on Speedy Trial. km  Status conference scheduled for August 12, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

CO: EFV, RPT: Elizabeth Frank, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Eric Gordon Johnson   DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton   DF:  Randy Lee Plaster appeared from jail. Defendant does qualify for PD.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.   Defendant is on a PO hold.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 8, 2015 at 10:00 am.
